snippet: France reached the Hopman Cup final when Richard Gasquet defeated Fernando Verdasco, 6-2, 6-4, on his fifth match point to secure a 2-0 win over Spain.
abstract: France reaches Hopman Cup tennis final after 2-0 win over Spain.
lead_paragraph: France reached the Hopman Cup final when Richard Gasquet defeated Fernando Verdasco, 6-2, 6-4, on his fifth match point to secure a 2-0 win over Spain.
